title: In case of tenements of 46
clause_text: In case of tenements of 46.45 sq. m carpet areafor rehabilitation or tenements to be handed over to the Planning Authority, the following shall be applicable. Calculation of FSI for all purposes shall be on gross area of the URS
section: Relaxation in Building and other requirements:-
